lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But in an address to a conference of the Indonesian Petroleum Association, he said, "If worst comes to worst and say the flow of oil through the Straits of Hormuz is completely shut off, I believe the world oil supply, given time to adjust, can take care of the situation."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Oil prices would skyrocket for a time if conflict in the Gulf closed the Strait of Hormuz, but oil supplies could be adjusted to take care of world demand, Indonesian Energy Minister Subroto said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Subroto, a member of Opec's three-man quota committee which has been touring cartel members, said speculation may play havoc with spot prices, but Opec was trying to stabilize the situation by urging cooperation by non-Opec producers.
